DOC.detailed_description: This conduct two-parts enrol total approximately 72 healthy volunteer . - Part A ass safety , tolerability , PD PK 125mg dose TRV734 open-label , randomize , three-period crossover study subject fast , fed standard meal , feed high-fat meal . - Part B trial ass safety , tolerability , PD PK multiple ascending dos TRV734 double blind , double dummy , randomize , active- placebo-controlled , adaptive study . Oxycodone immediate release ( IR ) 10 mg use benchmark .
